title: Healing Concert
address: Â§ßÈò™Â∏Ç, Japan¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Healing Concert very often with Professional Cellist ( 9 USD slot , higher rate )sometimes only Japanese monk ( 7 USD slot )30 minutes for normal sessions.45 minutes for private group sessions.Japanese Buddhist sutra chanting as a healing concert with the professional cellist who used to play with the Cape Town Philharmonic Orchestra. This is called music therapy.I will ask you to mute your mic while listening sounds, and do humming or breathing out. You will learn how much it is more effective in your body.First of all, the cellist plays alone for a while and explain about cello. You can ask her anything about cello.Then, cello and sutra start chanting together. I will explain sutra each time. You can ask him anything as well.Don't forget humming or breathing out while listening.You can learn not only cello and sutra chanting, but also feel the vibration to heal yourself with your body.one more to note, better high-speed Internet connection.
about_author: I am a Japanese Buddhist monkwho provide ANOTHER airbnb on-line experiences." MEDITATION WITH A JAPANESE BUDDHIST MONK "it is quite popular.Nowadays the world got super busy and too much information around. besides COVID-19...many people want to calm down.some still don't know how ...voice and cello , this type of sound , the vibration can heal those who like music.but how do we interact through online ?you shall breath out slowly or humming with our sound vibration.many guests who joined my meditation say my voice is very soothing while chanting mantra.so why not chanting sutra !also cello sound is deep and profoundas you would know The Wong Janice on airbnb online experience is pretty popular. this is also evidence.Now you can get cello & voice , one stone two birds !

title: The perfect fun & stretch yoga from India
address: Delhi, India¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Are you looking for unique and healthy experience? Are you stressed out from work? Lets begin the holiday joy with some streches !Are you bored and your body get stiffed because of sitting infront of your laptop for a long. You must be wondering how this can be different from others? in these 60 mins we will provide you a unique service in which you feel relaxed, flexibility, stretch your body and muscles, reduce your fat and build your inner strength. Get into a candid talk with Kapil as he introduces himself and you get to talk, discuss and know your health issues. Next we will start with some warm-up exercises. The whole class will be carefully guided while moving to exercise the mind too, every exercise will have variations for each level.We will create a sequence special for your type of body we will also get some time to solve any question about your practice.In 60minutes you will be immersed into fun movements doing-1. Breathing exercises2. Deep Meditation3. Yoga for body parts4. Vedic Sleep5. Detox body6. Yoga for stress, anxiety, immunity7. Weight loss8. Yoga with props for kids (on request)9. Strength, gratitude, mobility training10. Desk yogaThis experience will leave you feeling more connected to yourself and energized by your surroundings.At the end of the of the lesson you will feel more active, energetic and with reduced level of stress.
about_author: Staying fit with Yoga, Music & Meditations has been a family practice for us & with so many options of Yoga courses & practices nearby, we have grown up practicing Yoga & Meditation exercises for both mental & physical well being.A young yoga trainer Kapil is full of energy and happiness. He has been conducting yoga classes in pandemic to help people feel a little more healthy happy and wise!Kapil has undergone several advance level Yoga courses including that from Art of Living organization & The Rishikesh Yogi Group. He has been practicing advance level meditations like Sehaj Samadhi & 3-10 day silence programs for more than 12 years.Join him for a fun wonderful session of Yoga on this experience !

title: An Evening with a Flamenco Composer
address: Madrid, Spain¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 75 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Spanish
act_int: We will enjoy an intimate Flamenco Guitar Concert in Madrid, we will dive into the history of Flamenco through the sounds and melodies of the guitar.You will be able to differentiate all the codes the flamenco musicians use in their concerts and understand how they communicate with each other during their improvisation. You will see how we compose our music based on the ancestral culture of the Iberian Peninsula.The songs are composed by myself and based on the true flamenco traditions, the point of this experience is to get connection with the music by what the moorish called ‚Äúduende‚Äù, which brings clarity and knowelegqment through the rhythms and melodies.I have been doing flamenco experiences with Airbnb from more than three years, you can see my videos on @flamencocomposer and you can read the reviews at my Airbnb profile!During the concert we will have the opportunity to analyze some interesting photos about flamenco and its most relevant musicians, and how the most relevant artist of flamenco have change the history of this art and why.Join me to understand the secrets of this great music that has been growing along with the history of the Iberian Peninsula.This Experience is great for team-building. Book a private experience for your group. Is your group larger than my listed max group size for private groups? Send me a message.
about_author: My name is Santiago, originally from Madrid and I have been playing the Spanish guitar since a was a little child. From an early age, I got deeply interested in music through the flamenco voice melodies, and the genius of Paco de Luc√≠a - of course!For 30 years now, I am a flamenco guitarist and composer at the Dance School "Amor de Dios", the most renowned flamenco academy in the world. Throughout my career I have learned side by side from some of the greatest musicians of this art, who use to play with Camar√≥n de la Isla and  Paco de Lucia. And it is them who the musician that I am today.You can see some videos of my experiences with Airbnb at @flamemcocomposer

While the description had mentioned the use of both Spanish and English, I didn't expect that 90% of the explanation would be in Spanish. If that were to be the case, I think the host should say that the event is in Spanish, with a smattering of English thrown in. The actual music made up only about 20 or 30 minutes of the whole 75 minute experience (excluding the Q&A which went on for a good 20 minutes extra, none of which was in English). Given that almost all of the history and theory were in Spanish, I'd be lying if I said I gained much from the experience. The host spoke at length in Spanish and would stop to only translate one sentence here and there. While everyone else received detailed explanations of the different styles of flamenco, I was only told the names and maybe a sentence about the origin. If the host is unable to cram in explanations in two languages, then they could simply have different time slots for different languages. Almost all of the other people at the experience likely spoke more English that I did Spanish (read nil). In which case, the host could have simply used English or atleast genuinely made an attempt to translate in both languages. Not simply pick-and-choose sentences to translate while showing a slideshow and speaking in Spanish 90% of the time. My partner who speaks Spanish enjoyed the experience. I'm sure if I could have comprehended even half of it, I would be leaving a more positive review. However, I paid as much as everyone else at the experience, so I don't see why I was shortchanged. It was a thoroughly exclusionary experience, and one I would be loathe to go through again. So this review is from me, not from her. I'm the one who is into flamenco.For starters, I came to this experience with high expectations. I was not disappointed. Santiago's passion for flamenco was infectious. And his broad historical and cultural perspective on the subject was very enlightening. Where I had believed that flamenco was essentially a gypsy phenomenon, he was able to convey in words and in the music itself how flamenco has incorporated the musical roots of many different cultures. I especially appreciated how he captured the overlap of Moorish chanting with the sounds of flamenco singing and guitar playing. It is technologically challenging to transmit the brilliant staccatos of the flamenco guitar over the internet. But in spite of this limitation, Santiago was able to convey how the various flamenco styles have evolved in various regions of Spain and in various historical eras to yield the incredible diversity and complexity of rhythms in this genre. With no hesitation whatsoever, I would encourage  anyone with an interest in or appreciation of flamenco to take advantage of Santiago's availability to share his vast knowledge of and expertise in this deeply passionate musical expression. And be sure to ask Santiago any questions you may have. He packs a lot into his presentation. But he's ready to fly with your curiosity to areas that he hadn't already scripted. Ask him to help you really grok the spirit of duende. Now if only I could get back to Spain myself and find a way to visit with Santiago. title: Hidden Jazz Club
address: London, United Kingdom¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Be immersed in musical expression with jazz vocalists and musicians who have performed at world-famous venues including Royal Albert Hall in London, The Kennedy Center in Washington DC, and the Lincoln Center in NYC.For each show we curate 2-3 amazing performers an array of award-winning singers and instrumentalists in London/NYC. This project has helped keep our community working (and earning!!) through such a challenging time for the live music industry.We will pay tribute to some of our favourite jazz vocalists and composers as they swap songs and stories. Expect tunes made famous by Ella Fitzgerald, Nat King Cole, Chet Baker, Sarah Vaughan, Nina Simone, Duke Ellington and others.So pour yourself something nice, get dressed up if you like, invite a friend online, and we will bring a jazz club to your home for the night!This Experience is great for team events and we have performed shows for the likes of Google, Instagram, LinkedIn, Youtube, Airbnb, TikTok, & Princeton University. If your group larger than our listed max group size for private groups then please send me a message.www.HiddenJazzClub.com@HiddenJazzClub"Hidden Jazz Club are incredible. Not only are they world-class musicians, but they are top-notch professionals and very genuine people. Karen, Youtube.
about_author: ------We can be available for private events outside of the dates listed so please message us to discuss.------We are London locals who started Hidden Jazz Club, a series of pop up jazz clubs in cities around the world. Offering Online Concerts is an exciting next step!"One of the most interesting jazz vocalists and composers to emerge on the British scene in recent years." THE DAILY TELEGRAPH "One of Britain's finest jazz musicians and singers" Jazz FM"Strong earthy vocals and alluring charm." TIME OUT

title: Classical Piano Concert Live from Vienna
address: Vienna, Austria¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Classical Piano Concert from Vienna with an International Prize Winner Pianist!Perfect online concert for team building, birthday surprises and celebrations!I hosted Apple, Google, TikTok and many other companies..We can celebrate together your birthday, team building, graduation, marriage, baby born, family celebrations or any other.. There is always a beautiful surprise piece for you on my concert! :)Before the currently situation my concert experience was no. 1 Airbnb Experience in all Austria. I decided to continue to my concerts in Online because I believe beauty of music connect us with each other and do our community stronger. I love to share my passion music with people..I will tell short, interesting, funny stories behind of the pieces and play some famous classical piano pieces for you, also my own compositions..During the concert you can ask also your questions about music and piano. I would be very happy to answer your questions.I believe that this bad days will pass and we will meet again in beautiful concert halls but now time for Online Concert.Let's enjoy! :)www.abuzarmanafzade.comYouTube: abuzarmanafzadeInstagram: abuzarmanafzadeFacebook: abuzarmanafzadeofficialTwitter: abuzarmanafzade
about_author: "Classical Piano Concert" from Vienna with an international prize winner pianist!No. 1 Airbnb Experience in Vienna/Austria, now is ONLINE!Mozart, Beethoven, Chopin and others..I was born in Baku/Azerbaijan and live in Vienna/Austria. I studied piano, composition and orchestral conducting and won 18 Prizes in international piano competitions. In 2020, I received my Piano-Master Degree in Anton Bruckner University at Prof. Oleg Marshev's class in Linz/Austria and currently studying Orchestral Conducting in University of Music and Performing Arts of Vienna with Prof. Johannes Wildner. I perform in all around the world solo and with my family as pianist, composer and conductor.www.abuzarmanafzade.comYouTube: abuzarmanafzadeInstagram: abuzarmanafzadeFacebook: abuzarmanafzadeofficialTwitter: abuzarmanafzadePhoto: (c)Bernhard Wolf
comment_all: [{'time': 'January 2022', 'name': 'Brian', 'comment': "What a great experience!  Abuzar is extremely talented.  His original compositions are stellar.  And his selection of pieces from other composers were fantastic.  We really enjoyed the background and stories he told before playing each piece.  We would definitely recommend Abuzar's experience to others.  You won't be disappointed.", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'January 2022', 'name': 'Carmen', 'comment': "Just fantastic!this was my second meeting and I am equally impressed by Abuzar's dedication, passion and mastery.  Hope to see you live one day. All the best!!", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Emily', 'comment': "This is the third time we have attended one of Abuzar's concerts, and somehow it was even better than I remembered. The last one we joined was in January 2021, and since that time, we have been able to do a bit do more thanks to vaccines, and so I had wondered if the concert would feel less special. But...I was wrong! Once again, we were transported out of our home and connected with other people, other parts of the world, music, stories, and history. Abuzar is incredibly talented as a pianist, composer, and performer, and he is a very warm and friendly host and wonderful story teller. As much as we hope to see him in person one day soon, we are very grateful to be able to access his incredible talents online from the safety of our home for now. These concerts have been glimmers of light during some difficult times. I am already thinking of family and friends who would like to join us next time.Thank you again, Abuzar, and thank you especially for the special song you played for us. It was truly beautiful.", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Ulrich & Alexandra', 'comment': "Great variety from Beethoven's Elise till romantic master works, climaxing in his own compositions, accomponied by entertaining anecdotes - astonishing even for the experts !!!", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Caitlin', 'comment': 'A delightful mix of music - great audio/visual with cameras set above the keys and a profile view. Abuzar shared perfect tidbits about each composer and created a warm, welcoming session.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Rachel', 'comment': 'Absolutely amazing virtual concert. Learned about the pianist, his passion and study, the pieces he plays and the stories behind the pieces. Plus incredible original music. Capturing!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Trish', 'comment': 'Such a treat listening to this talented musician play! I have misse live music so much and this was a fantastic, intimate experience.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Tracie', 'comment': 'This was a fantastic way to spend an afternoon listening to Abuzar playing live from Vienna!  He was so personable and this was just an overall great experience!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Vincy', 'comment': 'Abuzar is an amazing musician and plays with such passion and enthusiasm. You can feel it in the music and immediately begin to feel calm and relaxed. It‚Äôs such an incredible experience!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Mira', 'comment': 'Such a special event! Abuzar is remarkably talented, interjected interesting information  and was so kind. Highly recommend this for a beautiful experience. Thank you so much again, Abuzar!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'November 2021', 'name': 'Anne', 'comment': 'This experience partook of the intimacy of a late night radio broadcast with the great honor of listening to a musical virtuoso perform for you live.  Abuzar was inviting, engaged with the compositions he performed (including walking with the great masters like Beethoven and Rachmaninoff using personal glimpses); and technically controlled yet highly interpretive as well.  He is someone whom I will go back and listen to again, with pleasure.  He interspersed both a Chopin Nocturne and an Impromptu into his program.  A lovely tango and a tribute to Eric Satie (playing the ribbon of music that accompanies the main character in The Queen‚Äôs Gambit.  With the attitude of respect for hos place and musical training in Vienna, Abuzar gave the last word to Mozart.  He could have held me captivated for hours longer.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'November 2021', 'name': 'Bethany', 'comment': 'This was a great performance, well worth the time! It was wonderful being able to ask questions, and speak with Abuzar. I would love to attend another concert.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'September 2021', 'name': 'Tanja', 'comment': "Thank you Abuzar for making this experience so special and going ahead and playing a private concert for me for an hour! Abuzar is super talented and friendly. I loved the anecdotes about the plays and the pianists in between the pieces and thoroughly enjoyed it! What a special concert. It's fun, playful, classic and you even get to hear his very own compositions as well, which just shows how talented he really is. Highly recommended!", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'July 2021', 'name': 'Emily', 'comment': 'Please do this experience! It was wonderful and Abuzar‚Äôs playing was absolutely breathtaking. He engaged with each of us and gave a brief history of each piece. title: Cello Meditation Concert
address: Amsterdam, Netherlands¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: * Perfect for virtual company events of up to 500! Enquire for large group discounts. * Contact for time customisations (30/45-minutes)* Contact to request a time/date not listed. Close your eyes, surrender and let sound meditation guide and cellist The Wong Janice take you on this 1-hour Live Cello Meditation Concert of deep ambient cello vibrations that will leave you feeling more grounded and calm. We will start with a short guided meditation and then enjoy 4 original cello compositions with different prompts to contemplate on. Each piece combines a grounding tone and sweeping melodies improvised live with effect pedals and loop machine. For the end of year edition, themes will be related to reflecting on achievements and surrendering to make way for the new year. For the new year edition, themes will be focused on setting intentions for the upcoming year.This experience is suitable for people with any level of meditation experience. All you need to do is commit to an hour of relaxation and live music! The Wong Janice has hosted 110+ happy teams around the world from Google, Facebook, Microsoft, Spotify, Philips, Airbnb and more, all which have reported feeling more relaxed, refreshed and energised by the end. To get a sneak peek of the music, find The Wong Janice on YouTube, Spotify and Apple Music and visit https://www.thewongjanice.com/.
about_author: Hi, my name is The Wong Janice, and I am a sound meditation guide and cellist based in Amsterdam.Combining years of classical music training with studies in Vipassana meditation, I create deep ambient cello meditation music.  In this unique online Airbnb Experience, I will take you on a journey of deep cello vibrations and sweeping cello melodies that will leave you feeling more grounded and emotionally connected. My Virtual Cello Meditation Concert has been booked by Google, Airbnb, Microsoft, Facebook, Philips, YouTube,  Adidas and more than 100 teams from companies all over the world. You can find out more about me by following me on YouTube and @thewongjanice on Instagram. Listen to my music on Spotify and Apple Music.
author_name: Meet your Host, The Wong Janice

The combination of mindfulness and music really helped me to get out of my head - I'll be returning!", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'June 2020', 'name': 'Maryhanna', 'comment': "First of all, The Wong Janice experience was highly enjoyable partnering relaxing classical or new age cello music with light meditation. She compelled a bit of light conversation from each of us making us feel at ease and welcomed to the experience. Started out with an introduction on the moods, feelings, or thoughts we might get out of each piece she played in which became my focus and I really experienced the musical journey in my own personal way. Meditation is most certainly not my strong suit- I am constantly moving either mentally or physically I'm afraid, so I wrote while she played. Gathering my thoughts on paper. The first song I felt as though I had started a journey & I was searching for answers to my questions on things in my life. Also it seemed as though I was traveling to different parts of the world- thus my desire to be free and experience the beauty of the world. Then I felt partly through the end of the song that I was going through a dire situation and felt kind of helpless, depressed, and sort of angry but then soon I was drawn away to another place still seeking, searching some how for something I can't express. The second song also felt like I was drifting, yet more focus, more forbidding, contemplating what step I needed to take in that next moment. Then the third song brought forth a light heartedness; it sounded like a light rain falling on a metal roof; bouncing off almost playfully. Then it became a dance, and it was peaceful, calming, & tranquil. The last song I felt like I was traveling again on my journey through time. title: Fun body percussion from Sydney
address: Sydney, New South Wales, Australia¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Body Percussion is a great way to get up & have fun learning about rhythms & coordination, group interaction & teamwork, personal musical ability & listening - and have fun together bringing out the inner drummer in you!‚Ä®Great for groups & parties: friends, family, students, workplace colleagues & corporate team building exercises to learn to listen to each other, and to communicate & work together.Also a great mental exercise tool, to learn coordination, simple patterns, and keep the brain active.All are welcome & able to participate - there are many ways to tap, clap & snap with your body, and body percussion helps you ‚Äòhear‚Äô & feel the beat :) Rhythms will be learnt in stages, and can also be played at different levels, so everyone will be comfortable playing along at their ability.We‚Äôll learn 6 different techniques to make sounds, a few different rhythms together and also team up in group activities to interact with each other and create music together - as well as how to solo by yourself‚Ä¶First, we‚Äôll all learn a little bit about clapping, tapping, slapping, snapping and stomping!¬†‚Ä®Then, we‚Äôll form two groups that will play against each other rhythmically - team coordination and individual listening is a must!¬†Next, we‚Äôll even sing a few songs along with body percussion accompaniment‚Ä¶‚Ä®Lastly, we‚Äôll ask a few volunteer soloists to improvise and do a solo :)
about_author: Dan has been playing drums since the age of 8, in all sorts of groups from Mexican wedding bands, to classical orchestras and jazz choirs, to Brasilian samba baterias! He has also performed quite extensively around the world, as well studying hand and body percussion throughout his life, including authoring several books about drumming, music and dance, such as; ‚ÄúDrums! The Philosophy of‚Ä¶‚Äù (Amazon.com/gp/product/B06XKBTHKB), "Pandeiro! The Philosophy of..." (Amazon.com/gp/product/1505813042), "Salsa" (Amazon.com/Salsa-Everything-Mother-Dancing-dancing-ebook/dp/B00JNFLY80), and others...

title: Singer-songwriter concert in Italy
address: Fornoli, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 75 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Italian
act_int: After a virtual glass of wine in our stone retreat in Tuscany,  we'll set off for a cultural and musical journey through Italy with a conversation about ‚ÄúCantautori‚Äù - the Italian singer-songwriters - an important piece of Italian culture. Though barely known abroad, Cantautori are the peak of Italian pop music. With them, songs cease to be just entertainment and become a form of civil commitment, introspection, philosophy, art. As a singer-songwriter myself, I followed Cantautori's steps in writing my own songs.I tailored my experience as a tour through 8 Italian cities/artists/songs. Each will be introduced by insightful storytelling and followed by one of my original songs, inspired by each artist. Before performing each song I will give you insights about Cantautori‚Äôs approach to songwriting and how it affected my own style.So, besides traveling through Italy, you'll meet a Cantautore yourself! I will be there to answer your questions.You'll be sent a booklet with all the lyrics of my songs with side English translation; it will also contain notes about Cantautori and their cities. It will be also a keepsake of your experience and possibly the itinerary of your next travel to Italy!I've been doing this experience for a while and discovered it's great for entertaining groups and for team building!
about_author: My name is Fabio D'Andrea and I'm a professional musician and singer/songwriter. I've been performing live as a multi-instrumentalist since the late '90s all over Italy. In 2008, my wife Silvia and I founded the first Italian tailored-songs' website. Through CANZONIsuMISURA¬Æ we've written and produced thousands of unique songs for people who want to exchange music as a gift for special occasions. Still, we feel there's nothing more exciting than performing live and connecting with the audience. Since 2013, Silvia and I are also proud Airbnb Superhosts of a guesthouse in Tuscany. Then, as Experiences became a thing, my passion for live music and storytelling led to open our terrace to music enthusiasts from all over the world for 5-stars intimate concerts.Ref: https://www.airbnb.it/experiences/758535
author_name: Meet your Host, Silvia E Fabio

title: Sign Language Love Language Serenade With Music
address: Atlanta, Georgia, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: SIGN LANGUAGE FOR BEGINNERS TO EXPERT LEVELS! This is a safe environment for young adults, children, families, businesses, team building, and non-profits ages 8-100 to get an authentic experience from Deaf professionals. Whether it's for a homeschooled course with a curriculum established, independent or group sessions, or just for fun, we have something for everybody! Perfect for beginners and advanced users of sign language!*Experience structure: 1. Song Selection2. Lyrics breakdown, we'll start to decipher the linguistics behind the lyrics and visualize how we can bring the words to life by painting a visual picture.3. Practice together.4. You're ready to spread your wings and fly!5. Background info6. Q&A about deaf cultureOther things to noteThis experience is tailor-made to fit each person that signs up to learn! Have no fear, you will leave this experience in much better spirits than you arrived with!
about_author: Greetings! My name is Matthew Maxey and I'll be your deaf teacher/ host as you embark on the journey of how to interpret some of your favorite songs with American Sign Language! I'll be co-hosting this experience with a fellow co-worker that is generationally deaf so that you get the most optimal version of this experience! As a deaf performer that focuses in sign language and music being combined, I have been featured on MTV, CNN, Cole Haan, GQ, RiseUp, and on tour with Chance The Rapper! I started up DEAFinitely Dope a few years ago to try to play an active role in merging mainstream culture and deaf awareness through sign language and music!Please welcome my co-hosts Martise Colston and Shawn Self, both products of deaf families and Gallaudet University!

title: Concert from Iceland
address: Reykjav√≠k, Iceland¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: I tell stories and perform my own compositions on guitar, accompanied by jazzy vocals. My music is indie-folk with a touch of blues. I also open up the space for questions you might have about music, creativity, or how it is to live in Iceland. After 7 years of tour guiding, I have become a specialist in taking guests on a journey connecting music and my own life to the Icelandic culture and its peculiar local traditions.A fun and intimate online experience streamed from a beautiful old Icelandic home with traditions and music.
about_author: H√¶! I'm Hanna Mia, a singer-songwriter living in Reykjavik, Iceland. I have worked as a professional musician since 2017, and currently a 2022 competitor in the Icelandic pre-selection for the Eurovision Song Contest. Apart from music, I have been a tour guide for 7 years and am used to taking care of visitors in Iceland and making you feel at home. See more of my music on hannamia.com or instagram.com/hannamiamusic.Times are flexible. Send me a message and we will find a time that works for you!

title: Private Show with a Nashville Songwriter
address: Nashville, Tennessee, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Every song has a story behind it. In this private concert experience, Nashville-based singer-songwriter Anne Buckle (aka WILDWOOD) will share the stories behind her songs.Over the course of an hour, Anne will perform original songs and talk about what inspired them, who she wrote them with, where she's performed them, and more. Switching effortlessly between piano, guitar, and violin, Anne will perform her songs as if she were on stage at the Bluebird Cafe, sharing insights into her creative process and tips for finding inspiration as a songwriter. You're welcome to ask her questions about her experiences; this is meant to be interactive! This session is ideal for folks who want to hear original music and learn about the creative process, or for aspiring artists looking to learn from a seasoned Nashville performer.Specific song requests are welcome, and this experience works well for private groups wanting to host a virtual house concert.
about_author: Anne Buckle - known as WILDWOOD - is a singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist with songs streamed millions of times. A descendent of the Carter family and a cousin of June Carter Cash, Anne has been called "a refreshing take on a legendary family" by the Nashville Music Guide. She is also a graduate of Harvard. Signed to Kobalt Music and SESAC, Anne has shared the stage with Charlie Daniels, toured with Augustana, opened for the Dixie Chicks on their DCX MMXVI World Tour, performed on the stage of the Grand Ole Opry, and is a regular at the Bluebird Cafe. She has written hundreds of songs with dozens of artists and is a songwriting instructor at the Country Music Hall of Fame, where she is part of the nationally acclaimed Words & Music and Songwriting 101 programs at the Taylor Swift Education Center.

title: Discover Italian Food with Folk music, the unexpected trip
address: Roma, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Have you ever tried Italian Food ? And have you ever thought that we have a lot of traditional songs about our delicious meals? A funny way to travel, with images, recipes and live songs through the culinary traditions of the "Bel Paese", the Beautiful Country!Me and my guitar are waiting for you!
about_author: I'm Daniele, I'm an architect and an art lover, with a long-standing passion for music, especially the one of the Italian tradition.I'm already an Airbnb host with a live experience here in Rome, with dozens of reviews.My guitar and I will introduce you to the folklore of the Italian regions and their diversity in terms of food but also landscape, dialects, wine ... storytelling guaranteed!PS the songs I play are older than 70 years or of popular domain and according to the Italian laws no copyright is due.

title: A Journey to Italy singing Folk Songs
address: Rome, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Italian
act_int: A PERFECT EXPERIENCE FOR  LARGE GROUPS,  FAMILY CELEBRATIONS, CORPORATE MEETINGS, TEAMBUILDING OR SIMPLY AS A GIFT TO ITALY LOVERS! With the help of my guitar and my singing,  we'll travel the Italian regions through the most popular folk songs, I will also provide a lot of informations about local traditions , so to have you understanding the incredible diversity of our beautiful ItalyBest way way to prepare a trip to Italy and get to know  our traditions, or discover new aspects of our people and country!   Ready to sing with me?PS  If your group is larger than my listed max group size for private groups or you are looking for a date and time not available in the program then please send me a message.One last thing: price is per person :) :  you can use the private group rate, if you want to have your own specializzato session!Ciao!
about_author: I‚Äôm Daniele, I am an architect and an art lover, with a longtime passion for music, especially the one of Italian tradition. I am already an Airbnb host with an experience of street art here in Roma, with dozens of reviews. Me and my guitar will introduce you to the folklore of the Italian regions and their diversity in terms of landscape, dialects, food, wine and habits...storytelling guaranteed!PS the songs I am playing are older than 70 years or of popular domain and according to Italian Laws no copyright is due.

title: Nashville Concert w/ Emmy Nominated host
address: NASHVILLE, Tennessee, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Wp9sVxwOXc Experience a musical journey from the heart of "Music City" USA in our private studio.Jackie is Master of Guitar, Denise is High Energy Party ! Laugh at touring stories, Stomp to "Nashville Hot Chicken Pickin", Groove to "Get Down on it"and join in with funky glasses and hats and sway to our Bic lighter moment! Country, Pop, Rock and Blues just like on Broadway. Hosted by Emmy Nominated TV host Denise Simons and touring and session musician for 35 years Jackie Simons, this couple gives an intimate look into the working musician's world by playing and singing both original and licensed music snippets on 7 guitars with a brief history of who made them iconic. Denise shares stories of their time together on the road and abroad which creates an immersive and personal experience.You'll feel connected as music brings us all together.Jackie has worked with some of the music industry's renown names such as Paramore, Kesha, Billy Ray Cyrus,  Kim Carnes, Rick Veto, Charles Wilson, and Brett Michaels.    Denise Simons is a TV host of an Emmy nominated design show. She lends her voice and southern hospitality to every show! Together we will welcome YOU! Ideal for anniversaries, birthdays, date night and for corporate groups looking for team building for connection. CORPORATE GROUPS UP TO 500!! 5 star CARFAX,CISCO,TRAVELTREK,YORK UK, FLAGLER
about_author: We are Jackie and Denise are passionate about music. We love sharing our lifelong music career and  inspiring others in their talents and sharing their experience of music that elevates the heart, mind and soul. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Wp9sVxwOXcWe include and connect with music.https://www.hrgrapevine.com/content/article/jackie-denise-virtual-entertainment-2021-02-05-music-shedding-light-on-inclusion-mental-health-connection?preview=1We bring our experiences of "Music City" and playing world wide to you in this private concert, music from many genres. We'll share what it means to be a Nashville music city resident and to be among the greatest musicians in the world. Jackie is a touring and session musician and Denise  is a TV host of an Emmy nominated design show. She lends her voice and  southern hospitality!
author_name: Meet your Host, Denise And Jackie

title: Indian Music & Acting - A Fusion Experience
address: New Delhi, India¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Hindi
act_int: Ours is a fusion experience - a blend of Indian Music and Acting. It is an immersive experience where we aim to emphasize the importance of Art in daily life and use a fun and interactive approach to do so.This experience is ideal for individuals, groups (families, corporates) and is fun to explore irrespective of whether you're a beginner or experienced.The experience begins with an introduction game as opposed to a plain and simple introduction to make sure you get comfortable and get to know each other.After that we chat about acting and music, your relationship with art and encourage you to participate in activities throughout the experience. These require no special skills and it's all about fun, team work and participation. The focus is on understanding oneself through the medium of emotions, voice and being creative.*Our experience is all about 60 minutes of learning, sharing and experiencing.*The next segment comes with a unique surprise, post which you will be able to assess your creativity and emotions better and develop an appreciation for Art.It ends on a high note with diverse games from quizzes, to improv activities related to music and acting.Joining us in this journey will surely help you with better confidence, creativity and imagination and a new perspective towards Art. Our aim is to share our love of these Art forms and hope to create some joy!
about_author: Shreya & Kabir have been associated with their art form for many years and understand their art and style really well. They're both teaching their respective art to students all over the world. Along with that, they've been hosting online experiences for over a year now.Shreya is a trained Indian classical vocalist who uses music to make interesting mind, body and soul revelations. She is graceful & extremely passionate about music and crafts.Kabir is a trained Actor and theatre enthusiast. He is a 'romantic' about his craft and adopts a unique approach to impart his knowledge to others by making them fall in love with acting and by helping them understand the intricacies of the same.

title: Learn To Play Ukulele From The Heart
address: Sydney, New South Wales, Australia¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Have Fun learning to play ukulele your way - by writing a song & singing-along!Bring out the inner musician in you, on the easiest & most fun instrument to learn to play‚Ä¶ I guarantee, within the session, (even as an absolute  beginner :) you will be able to make up your own chords, melodies and songs - and sing-a-long!We will learn 5 of the most common chords in C Major (the most popular musical key), and strumming (plus fingerpicking, scales & solo‚Äôing) styles to discover your own ability & unique musical personality to shine thru (even in a group) everyone will explore & develop their own style :)I am a very ‚Äòun-conventional‚Äô music teacher‚Ä¶ I emphasize finding your inner style & expression in music, as well as having fun experimenting & ‚Äòdoodling‚Äô - and getting confident  to ‚Äòsing-along‚ÄôIt‚Äôs honestly like several months of lessons in one session - a great overview of everything you can do with ukulele + you get a free ‚Äòhomework‚Äô PDF booklet to keep for notes & practiceIf you want to have a peek, this is like my ‚ÄòUkulele at Bondi Beach‚Äô experience that moved online due to Covid restrictions - airbnb.com/bondibeachukuleleEveryone is welcome! I cater to all levels and different learning styles, as it is not just a standard, 'traditional' scripted class session - everyone and every experience is unique :)A great gift idea for partners, families, friends & more...
about_author: I've been a professional musician since about the age of 12 and have taught music at university, as well as lately more 'one-on-one' and casual private group lessons in -person and online (I have another 'live' in-person Airbnb ukulele experience ‚ÄòLearn to Play Ukulele on Bondi Beach‚Äô - https://www.airbnb.com.au/experiences/139260)I love that the ukulele is so easy to learn to play & have a good time with -- it's heaps-of-fun! I also teach music therapy for people with disabilities, and am amazed how quickly everyone can start making music on their own :)I'm also kinda known as a 'music-whisperer' matching up people with what 'style' they might play... I like bringing out everyone's own 'personality' in their playing :)

title: Tango Concert with Latin Grammy Nominee
address: Buenos Aires, Argentina¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Spanish
act_int: *This experience is ideal for corporate groups, team-building, anniversaries, special celebrations and private groups. Now accepting private groups up to 100. Contact us to request a date.--Experience a soulful, intimate journey into the world of tango. Part cocktail party, part history lesson, part live concert, we will learn about the culture while feeling the camaraderie that comes from sharing live music together!We love to bring people together across cultures through the music and stories of tango.Through history, live music and personal anecdotes drawn from our four decades on stage, we will lead you from the origins of tango in the 1890s to the thriving Buenos Aires music scene of today, full of bands like ours that are reinventing tango for the modern world.Join us for a world-class concert... in your living room!--This experience is great for team building, date nights, family celebrations and all cultural adventurers. Custom-tailored events available for private groups. Join teams from Google, Facebook, Netflix and many other companies, law firms and universities that have already visited Buenos Aires virtually though the music and stories of tango.This is part tango history class, part concert. We speak in English and sing in Spanish.This is an online, virtual experience that can be joined from around the world. We look forward to meeting you.
about_author: Mar√≠a is a Latin Grammy-nominated tango singer born and raised in Buenos Aires, and I am a harmonica player originally from California. Mar√≠a has recorded 10 albums and has won Argentina's top music prizes and been nominated for a Latin Grammy. She is also a member of the Tango Hall of Fame. In 2010, we formed a band called the Blue Tango Project and we tour the world exploring the fusion of tango and blues. When we are back home, we love to share the musical treasures of Argentina with visitors to Buenos Aires.I moved to Buenos Aires many years ago, following the perfume of tango. It's been a dream come true. I often say that I moved to Buenos Aires to study the spiritual practice of tango...and it's no joke!

I would highly recommend this for any date night!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'February 2021', 'name': 'Wendy', 'comment': "From Raymond Mitchell: Want a lift? A ride that will leave you smiling and feeling the love? Try hanging out with these two utterly charming people. I get it. They're performers. But they're so much more. They just go together perfectly. Frankly, I'd love just to hang out with them for a day or two. Listen to some music, drink a glass of Malbec, talk about music and about life, make some music together, and maybe even join in the dance. The theme is tango. But who knew that tango comes in so many colorful shades? Their specialty is in the blue spectrum. Kevin's bluesy harmonica blends with Maria's subtle guitar and (to my ears) her French-toned voice in a truly beguiling way. In delicious instrumental counterpoint, he whispers back to her the fiery passion of her words, quietly echoing their shared longings for a perfect synchrony of complementarities. And they do it as smoothly as a polished pair of tango dancers. This is uniquely creative stuff, and like a great aperitif, it stimulates an appetite for conviviality. Of course, they also took us all out for a ride through the history of tango and the neighborhoods of Buenos Aires where it all began, peaked, faded, and arose again in revitalized forms. Climb on board and settle in for a cozy time with this cozy couple in the warmth of their cozy home. Bring along a special friend if you can.", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'February 2021', 'name': 'Elyse', 'comment': 'We had a great night with Maria and Kevin learning about the history and evolution of Tango dance and music. act_int: Te invito a la mesa de este bar virtual para conversar sobre tango y pasar un momento muy ameno.  Tomemos una copa o un caf√© y charlemos‚Ä¶ ¬øDe qu√© nos habla el tango? ¬øQu√© es el lunfardo? ¬øQu√© es la poes√≠a tanguera? ¬øC√≥mo son los bares de Buenos Aires?Luego de dedicar algunas palabras a los bares y caf√©s porte√±os, tan √≠ntimamente ligados a la vida cotidiana de la ciudad, te contar√© acerca de mi pasi√≥n por el tango y hablaremos sobre su evoluci√≥n, sus poetas, sus compositores, las orquestas y cantantes. Conversaremos tambi√©n sobre grabaciones de tango,  discos, partituras,  coleccionistas y te mostrar√© algunos discos y otros documentos que te sorprender√°n.Har√© todo lo posible para que realmente sientas  que estamos en la mesa de un bar de Buenos Aires, compartiendo un muy grato momento junto a la m√∫sica de esta ciudad.Al finalizar la experiencia, vas a tener una idea m√°s acabada del tango como obra musical y po√©tica  que se agregar√° a la ampliamente difundida, del tango como danza; as√≠ como tambi√©n sobre algunos aspectos de esta ciudad y sus habitantes, reflejados en las mismas obras musicales.Ten a mano tu bebida preferida y encontr√©monos para compartir esta experiencia tanguera. Te espero.Puedes participar de la experiencia en l√≠nea desde una computadora, celular o tablet.
about_author: Soy cantante,  apasionado por la m√∫sica y por la cultura de Buenos Aires,  mi ciudad.  Estudi√© m√∫sica y mi inter√©s por el tango y su poes√≠a me impuls√≥ a profundizar mi conocimiento sobre el lunfardo. Desde hace m√°s de diez a√±os difundo la m√∫sica a trav√©s de participaciones en emisiones de radio y dirijo actividades culturales. Desde 2016 dirijo  un taller  en el que la m√∫sica y la palabra convocan a disfrutar de un momento ameno entre los participantes. Peri√≥dicamente presento mis shows.Amo los bares porte√±os, lugares de encuentro, inspiraci√≥n y contacto con la vida cotidiana. Son el lugar ideal  para conversar sobre temas que nos apasionan, como el tango.En la mesa de algunos bares porte√±os he realizado en forma  presencial la experiencia que hoy presento en forma virtual y cuyos comentarios me han brindado much√≠simas satisfacciones.

It was one of the best expeeinces I attended so far (of more than 15 that I have so attended) . It's so romantic, customized and refreshing. Their little home look so comfortable and I felt as if I was seated right inside their home. They have very thoughtfully chosen the poems, music , records and stories. title: Secrets of Bossa Nova
address: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 90 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English, Spanish, and Portuguese
act_int: I will tell you the history of Bossa Nova. Telling you about Brazilian special music and Rio de janeiro social behavior. I will play nylon string guitar, showing you the Bossa Nova rhythms and history. I've been doing this experience in my studio in Ipanema for the last 3 years with lovely comments and feedbacks.Great for groups, Great for team-building.                      Contact me for a new date. The schedulle that you want for your group.
about_author: I‚Äôm a professional guitar player, who has worked with some of the most important artists of my generation, including Fagner, Baby Consuelo, Carlos Lyra, Marcos Valle, and many others. I love the flair of the Ipanema lifestyle, from the beat of the streets to the birds and waves that made bossa nova famous and adored worldwide.I,ve been doing my experience a live for three years with more than 250 five stars reviews.I love music and love to talk about Brazil and his music.Great for groupsGreat for team-building.Contact me for a new date.

I was expecting to enjoy the music--and I did. It's my favorite listening music and has been ever since the early '60s. But Cecelo added a down home context that makes it clear just where Bossa Nova fits into the Brazilian cultural scene. Do you know what Bossa means? I didn't. Do you know what it means to walk or work or play Brazilian style? Cecelo's words will put the gentle movement of Boss Nova into your body. It's a quiet thing, subtle, intimate. Talk to him. Ask him questions. Share your own feelings about the music. His enthusiasm is infectious (in a good way). Now if only I could just jet down to Rio and hang out with him on the beach at Ipanema. He makes learning to play Boss Nova on the guitar look fun and easy. And he even makes it clear that anybody can sing in this style. It's just a whispery poem of appreciation for the beauty and warmth of life (and the lovely ladies that cross our paths). Some day I want to compose and play  a Bossa Nova song. title: Songwriting with a Nashville Musician
address: Nashville, Tennessee, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: In this 90-minute virtual session, you will start from scratch and co-write a complete, original song with Anne Buckle, a professional songwriter in Nashville. Never written a song before? Great! Simply come with a willingness to be vulnerable and an idea or two. Anne will coach you every step of the way, from picking a theme to writing the lyrics to putting the words to a melody and adding chords on guitar, ukulele, or piano.This experience is great for one-on-one private sessions to pen your own individual song and also for groups as a team-building activity! Anne has worked with dozens of businesses, museums, schools, and other organizations to lead and facilitate interactive group songwriting sessions both online and in-person. Notable past clients include Accenture, Match.com, Hotjar, Story Terrace, First Round, The Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum, Wounded Warrior Project, and Hamilton College.Post-session deliverables include an MP3 recording of the song with a lyric/chords sheet, sent to you via email.Send Anne a message to request time/date slots that are not currently listed. Please click on "See more dates" and then "Request availability.*Booking a "Public" session means there will be other Airbnb guests in the session. If you'd like to write your own personal song, please book a "Private" session. (10% off for groups of 6+; 50% off for groups of 11
about_author: Anne Buckle - known as WILDWOOD - is a singer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist with songs streamed millions of times. A descendent of the Carter family and a cousin of June Carter Cash, Anne has been called "a refreshing take on a legendary family" by the Nashville Music Guide. She is also a graduate of Harvard. Signed to Kobalt Music and SESAC, Anne has shared the stage with Charlie Daniels, toured with Augustana, opened for the Dixie Chicks on their DCX MMXVI World Tour, performed on the stage of the Grand Ole Opry, and is a regular at the Bluebird Cafe. She has written hundreds of songs with dozens of artists in her 8-year career in Nashville so far.

title: Drumming meditation and African folk songs
address: Nairobi, Kenya¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: First we will start by introduction, knowing me knowing you and make sure we are all comfortable to start the experience.I will explain to you the four parts of this experience which is 1. Self love and appreciation, 2.  instrumental and vocal rhythms, 3. self affirmation and 4. Body movement ( A hyped dance-able rhythm that you can dance and feel happy about yourself, its A 'ME TIME' experience.In this experience my main aim is to help you travel back in time and find your inner child the peaceful playful toddler in you and back to reality and help you remain playful through out your life by adopting all the steps we take in this experience and most importantly take you through different Kenyan traditions from the coast, central to the lakeside through playing instruments and singing.During the experience I will play a collective of different instrumentsThen we will learn an African dance moves that you can dance along with the beat from the drum and other percussion.This experience is also great for team building and connecting with friends and families you have not been able to see other  for some time and am always flexible to accommodate any team request.This experience starts slow and get more interesting and fun as we proceed so please be patient and put your cameras on for a happy, 'ME TIME' experience.
about_author: I am a music, dance and art therapist for wellness and both an independent and grouped musician of Swaspanlish a fusion of Swahili Spanish and English and my music can be found in all music platforms such as iTunes and Spotify under the name ' Senyor C-Jeys.'I am currently a dance and art therapy teacher at Circle special school located in the suburbs of capital Nairobi where I grew up.When am not teaching I prefer visiting charitable organisations and have some fun activities with the beneficiaries or patients at hospitals where we can sing, dance, draw and learn about self love.When am away from all these that's the time to write music, rehearse with my Daraja Band, recording music or connecting with my friends through jam sessions.

title: Into the Mystical Music of Lisbon Fado
address: Lisboa, Portugal¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Enjoy a private concert that transports you to the streets of Lisbon without ever leaving the house. In this virtual version of a popular Airbnb Experience (https://www.airbnb.com/experiences/320330), you‚Äôll get immersed in the mystical world of Fado music. Declared "Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity" by UNESCO, Fado music, and more importantly Fado concerts, are an essential part of life in Lisbon. With a 30-minute live concert and accompanying Q&A, we‚Äôll explore its rich history and roots and the most emblematic fado singers, musicians, and composers.You‚Äôll receive a setlist with lyrics and translations for each song that I perform, so that you can understand the magic of this music tradition.So sit back with a glass of vinho verde and enjoy the sounds of Lisboa.This Experience is great for team-building. Book a private experience for your group. Is your group larger than my listed max group size for private groups? Send me a message.Good for company groups, team building, private groups, corporate teams.
about_author: My name is Maja Milinkovic, and I‚Äôm an internationally recognized professional fado singer/songwriter with five award-winning albums. My latest album, ‚ÄúFadolinka,‚Äù ranks among the 20 best world music albums on the World Music Chart for 2019. I attended the Music Academy of Sarajevo to get a degree in classical music and I work as a singing instructor and vocal coach. I fell in love with Fado (traditional Portuguese music) 13 years ago and changed my life to follow my passion for it. I live in Lisbon, Portugal, and my mission is to help other people discover this beautiful and deep style of music. Fado is more than music‚Äî it‚Äôs a way of life. Join me on this unforgettable musical journey. To read reviews for my in-person experiences on fado, please look at my profile: https://www.airbnb.com/users/show/195468826

title: Classical music appreciation meeting
address: Vienna, Austria¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 2 hours ¬∑ Hosted in English and Italian
act_int: Classical Music is a wonderful, deep art. It is also a complex way of expression and communication. To a listener, this complexity can be perceived and felt as a barrier, a barrier that does not allow to live the music and touch its heart as much as desired.In this experience I am going to guide you through this barrier: together we will approach new pieces, see music from different perspectives, get to know the inner world that gives birth to a musical masterpiece and become able to listen to it with "musician ears" and new awareness, understanding and enjoyment, without needing to acquire technical knowledge nor deal with "musician stuff".Through concrete examples and interesting cultural talk I am going to show you how to navigate through several steps from the first, most instinctive listening to gradually deeper and richer experiences.We are going to understand music as a whole, taking a deep look into what is made of and how it can be so captivating and trampling and how while listening can we dive into it and feel it on a more dynamic and exciting level.
about_author: My name is Giacomo, I am an Italian classical violinist and music teacher. I came to Vienna to study violin in 2016, but later on I discovered my true vocation: teaching how to listen to Classical Music and getting people in touch with it, sharing my passion and expertise.I have been teaching music appreciation as a professional since early 2018 and in 2019 I started welcoming Airbnb guests for a live experience here in this city. In a few months it climbed the ranks becoming one of the top rated and appreciated.I met dozens of enthusiastic learners and I am now happy to engage with the online community and offer here my expertise.You can find my offline experience at this link: https://www.airbnb.co.uk/experiences/840790Feel free to read the reviews and get a better idea of what and how I teach and the guests' experience about it!

title: Japanese Healing Songs by Romantic Guitar Solo
address: Êù±‰∫¨, Japan¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: During this 45 minute online classic guitar session, I invite you to take part in an age-old Japanese Shinto custom called ‚ÄúNaorai‚Äù. Naorai is a banquet held after Shinto festivals and ceremonies, and originally had the purpose of breaking the fast to going back to normal day-to-day life by eating and drinking together. I believe we can virtually recreate the spirit of Naorai by substituting music for food and sharing our own sounds. After introducing ourselves to each other, you can indulge yourself in the sounds of the 19th-century guitar as I play widely-known guitar masterpieces, as well as a Japanese nursery rhyme. At the end of the session, I‚Äôll wear a Noh mask and improvise a song, which you are welcome to join me and jam out together. It doesn‚Äôt even have to be a musical instrument, play whatever and however you feel like playing; If the action of grinding coffee beans makes you focus, that‚Äôs the instrument for you.  So, let's sharing live music together! This experience will be held live online.Other things to noteYou‚Äôll need an internet connection and the ability to stream audio and video to participate. A link and details on how to join will be included in your booking confirmation email.
about_author: I‚Äôm Kai,  classic guitarist, specializing in improvised playing. I majored in classic guitar in a New York college, and while I was there, I got fascinated by creative music therapy which utilized sounds in a spontaneous, impromptu way to treat the elderly and autistic kids. It gave me an epiphany that human intuition to ‚Äúidentify‚Äù something ‚ÄîI call this ‚Äúminashi‚Äù‚Äî is essential to improvisation.  Since then, I‚Äôve been on a journey to find ‚Äúminashi‚Äù inside myself and perceive own physical existence. India, Turkey, Cambodia or Japanese remote islands; wherever I went, I brought my 19th century guitar with me to ‚Äúconnect‚Äù with locals through improvised guitar performances.  Today, to discover what it means to ‚Äútruly connect‚Äù with people, I continue my journey and provide places for people to take part together in spontaneous musical sessions

title: Crystals and Cocktails with a Creative
address: Tulum, Mexico¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: I designed this experience around a few of my favorite things; music, crystals, and cocktails!  We'll begin by going over our ingredients and the stones we may want to use for our drinks. Don't worry you'll receive a detailed list of needed tools and elements beforehand!The cocktails will reflect a spirit in alignment with the season and my location. I like to feature Whiskeys for the winter and Mexcals in the summer :) I'll show you some secrets to making elixirs that elevate your energy with magical herbs and spices! After topping off our first drink with a cherry and a crystal, we'll watch one of my brand new music videos! It's my joy to share music and imagery with the world. Also, I like to offer my guests to send song ideas for our playlist as we create our drinks, too. My mantra is 'Be Yourself to Free Yourself' and that's what hosting this experience is about to me, it's my hope to pass that torch of courage to you and leave you feeling fierce, inspired, armed with new recipes to share and maybe some unique new friends from around the world, too! You'll also get digital recipes and streaming links to my music. Group and single bookings welcome. Each person should make a reservation. See my profile for reviews and more! Let's create and toast to the season of making self-care fun and fabulous!
about_author: I'm a creative artist currently living in beautiful Tulum, Mexico! With roots in Northern California, I built my own brand as a musician, private organic-chef,  photographer, and spiritualist. We artists tend to have multiple passions and I'm grateful mine have carried so many places! I've released 2 albums, singles, dozens of music videos, and performed hundreds of shows and dinners. My music, Bellstarr, is streamed worldwide and I couldn't be more grateful to be at work on a new LP.  As a private chef, I created gourmet experiences for celebrity clients throughout LA for a decade. After re-locating to Joshua Tree, CA 5 years ago I put down the knife and picked up the camera to supplement my work as a musician. I never stopped entertaining and always kept the flame of spirit burning. It's an honor to now host on this platform!

title: The Healing Harp Personalized Sessions
address: Ashland, Oregon, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: ***Currently offering Seasonal Music - Christmas, New Year***Great Gift to Self or for Connecting with Those you Love!****       ** Great Way to Celebrate a Birthday over the miles!**I'M HAPPY TO CONSIDER OTHER DATES & TIMES-PLEASE ASK!We begin this online experience with harp music as you nestle in a comfortable place, sip comforting tea, close your eyes, rest your mind, & let the music connect with your heartbeat. As I bathe you in sound that many say feels like a massage, I can even customize soothing harp music to your own natal sign.  Western music has 12 major tonalities & these are coordinated with 12 birth signs. Using the special tonality for your birthday, I play calming harp music in *your tonality*. This experience is personalized & very centering!We explore the use of music & harps in healing, including clinical use to relieve pain & anxiety, calm heart beat, level blood pressure. I weave in ways that were used centuries ago to provide care, interspersed with opportunities to indulge your ear, mind, & spirit in ancient & modern harp sound. At the end we settle with a mini-concert of flowing harp music. I follow up with information on continued self-care.Bring a favorite diluted essential oil to make this experience multi-sensory and interactive using AromaAcupoint Therapy! (optional) Rose or Lavender highly recommended.
about_author: I am a Certified Healthcare Musician with a Masters in Music. As a professional harpist for 40 years, I've played for a wide gamut of events, from 7 years for hospice to 30 years for weddings, from life celebrations to music baths.  I have been offering "Music Baths" to groups and individuals for over 20 years, bringing relief from stress, anxiety, and emotional pain, calming the mind, and immersing people in sounds that make one feel whole at a deep level. I am also certified in Aroma Acupoint Therapy, Level 2: applying specific essential oils to specific acupuncture/acupressure points. I combine these in this opportunity to enjoy a Music Spa‚Ñ¢ that indulges the senses and relaxes and soothes the mind, body, and spirit.

title: Simply Relaxing Harp Music
address: Ashland, Oregon, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: ~~~Music to Melt Stress & Anxiety~~~I'M HAPPY TO CONSIDER OTHER DATES & TIMES-PLEASE ASK!Listen and breathe to heart-beat rate music specifically chosen to soothe and calm your mind and body as you sit or lie back in a comfy place. As your breathing and heart beat entrain to the tempo of the music, stress melts away while Celia, a Certified Healthcare Musician, plays her Healing Harp for a quieting time designed to help you let go of your tension, stress and anxiety. We will briefly meet and greet, Celia will provide a short background of this mode of relaxing, and then we will have our ~25-minute concert of serene music‚Ä¶the big difference with this concert is that it is uninterrupted by applause or speaking‚Ä¶. the music comes and goes, intermixed with silence only, until the very last piece.Music selections will change with the season and may pertain to some holidays. ***Currently Playing Seasonal Music for the New Year. For private experiences, feel free to ask for an individualized focus of selections.I am flexible with my dates and times for groups of 3 or more - please ask!
about_author: I've played the harp many years and during the last decade focused on therapeutic harp music, including receiving my certification as a "Certified Healthcare Musician."With a Masters Degree in Music, I've been able to spend my career life doing what I love. As a professional harpist, I've played for a wide gamut of events, from hospice to weddings, from life celebrations to music baths. I have been offering "Music Baths" to groups and individuals for over 20 years, bringing relief from stress, anxiety, and emotional pain, calming the mind, and immersing people in sounds that make one feel whole at a deep level.

title: Canada's Old West History in Song & Tale
address: Okotoks, Alberta, Canada¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: ‚ÄúWe need music to feel at equilibrium in these challenging times.‚Äù > Yo-Yo-MaFrom international award-winning singer/songwriter Jim Reader‚Äôs home studio in the foothills of the magnificent Canadian Rocky Mountains, comes this extremely unique "edu-taining" multi-media presentation.  The homey atmosphere allows guests to relax in their own comfortable environment and escape from our wacky world back into another era for a while.  Jim's  performance includes a split screen that includes over 200 vintage photos, artwork and graphics that augment the theme and lyrics of every song, poem and story.  Guests will feel the wind, smell the sage and taste the traildust down the trails of North America's Old West.  Particular emphasis is on Alberta's early frontier and the NorthWest Territories of the late 1880's.
about_author: A retired hobby rancher, Jim Reader is an award-winning (Canada and USA) seasoned Singer/Songwriter and Cowboy Poet. Jim's historical songwriting pays tribute to Alberta's rich western heritage > the buffalo, the First Nations, the North West Mounted Police; the first cattle, ranchers, cowboys, pioneers and settlements in the West of the late 1880's. Entertaining and enlightening, Jim's concert has received accolades from community, school and special events venues. Included is a visual component with hundreds of historical photos and artwork that support the lyrics of every song, story and poem. Guests will definitely feel the wind, smell the sagebrush and taste the trail dust in this refreshing ride up the trails of the Old West!

title: Write & Take Home a Song from Nashville on Zoom
address: Nashville, Tennessee, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: You don't have to be a musician/songwriter to enjoy this experience: it's for everyone. The goal is to write something meaningful to you, that tells a piece of your own story and that you'll be able to take home a recording of, once we're finished.Also, you will not be sharing this experience with any stranger. Once the session is scheduled, no one else will be able to book it. It's for you and your loved ones exclusively - up to four guests.First, you will be welcomed into my virtual state of the art music studio (using Zoom), where I'll get to know you and understand a piece of your story and what you want to say in your personalized song. I offer guitar, strings of all kinds, percussion and all vocals to operate, run and record everything for you. One woman show. You will leave having bravely bared your heart and soul into a new and beautiful piece of music just for you. In your words.I want you to feel completely comfortable and to be open about your important life experiences, so we can hone in on your desired subject matter.  I would love to know your favorite styles of music and artists so we can draw from inspiration that resonates with you, personally.In the end, you‚Äôll leave this experience with a recorded demo of the song we wrote together. I'll send you all the music digitally, so you can then play it on your own devices anytime, anywhere.
about_author: After 35 years of classical music training and world touring with artists as Taylor Swift, Ringo Starr, Luke Bryan, Shakira to name a few, I now offer this special opportunity to put your story to song.  Your own personalized song to take home.  A memory to have forever.  I've had the honor of writing and recording THE wedding dance song for a bride and groom, serenading and recording therapeutic healing music for a broken heart and anything and everything in between!

title: Lesson with Multi Platinum Guitarist
address: Latham, New York, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Everyone is unique and has a special ability.  As an instructor my job is to help and fix any problem the student may have as an individual, like a doctor would to a patient. You can be any level, any age and into any style of music.  If you never played before, I will show you all the basics and continue teaching you all the way up to become a seasoned professional.I will show you step by step how to play music you like and how to play your favorite songs, learn how to read music, chords, scales, arpeggios, music theory and exercises.If you want to become a virtuoso on the guitar.  I will show you many exercises and ways to become a shredder.  Several ways to increase your speed, fretboard fluency, how to sweep pick and much more.The lessons are very open as well, so if you just want to do something specific for example, like just learning your favorite songs or learning certain techniques.   Several of my students became highly successful in the music world. As a teacher it is very important to bring out the creativity in the student and to encourage them to make their own music, instead of always copying someone else.As well as guitar, bass guitar and ukulele students are welcome.The lessons are 30 - 60 minutes in length.  30 minutes is usually enough for beginners.Also, there will be master classes conducted as well.Other things to noteThe lessons are open to all levels and are customizable based on your skill.  The lessons are open to all styles of music.Also, if you are a beginner and feel the hour is too long, we can arrange for a 30 minute lesson.  Feel free to contact me to discuss this.
about_author: I'm a premier guitar instructor and performer with almost 30 years of experience.  I'm an honors graduate from the Musicians Institute in Hollywood, CA.  I have written several lessons in world wide, magazine publications and I currently have my own monthly guitar column in Italy's top guitar magazines.  I have worked with and supported several major artists on shows and tours.  I was a member of the multi platinum group , the Trans-Siberian Orchestra.  I have released 10 solo albums.  I perform and tour all over the world with my band and I do masterclasses and clinics all over as well.  Visit www.mikecampese.com.  I'm a full time musician with lot's of experience.  I have been teaching guitar and performing since high school.  I feel being an instructor and a performer is very important to instruct others to what works in real life.

title: Intimate Gig from Somewhere in the World
address: Londra, United Kingdom¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English, Spanish, and Italian
act_int: This is an online experience, so we will connect via internet. Great for groups, teams and for team-building. The price is per person (not per connected device).If you are curious about the similar experience I do in person, please check this link https://abnb.me/4OyeoZVO65 and read the reviews of my previous guests. We will chat a few minutes in order to better know each other.I will play a few ice-breaking songs. We will have a game, which involves my original songs and the stories behind them. I will invite you to join me in singing and following the rhythm by clapping hands or whistling, nothing too difficult to do.We will take some picture to remember the good time spent together and goodbye!Other things to note:I suggest to use earphones in order to have a better quality of audio.
about_author: I am a singer-songwriter (@pablandretola) and a traveller from Latina (Italy); I have been living and playing in Italy, Madrid, Brazil, Argentina and London (where I also host Airbnb live experiences).

title: Afro-Peruvian Dances and Live Music
address: Lima, Peru¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 75 mins ¬∑ Hosted in Spanish and English
act_int: In this online experience we want to share with you our Afro-Peruvian dances and rhythms.You will learn the most used dance steps in the Festejo, one of the most representative dances of the Afro-Peruvian culture. Then we will continue dancing Zamacueca !, another dance that is characterized by the use of scarves. And with the steps learned we will do together a dance sequence that you can then continue practicing at home.You will also enjoy LIVE musical intermissions! with Afro-Peruvian music and its different rhythms where we will play some Afro-Peruvian instruments such as the Peruvian caj√≥n, the cajita, the jaw and the bell.We want to transmit all the Afro-Peruvian energy to you through dance, music, anecdotes and a family atmosphere and camaraderie as well as our families transmitted the culture to us and how we did it in another experience on Airbnb that you can review here: https: // www .airbnb.com.pe / experiences / 1258352You will learn, live and enjoy a magical and festive Afro-Peruvian experience from the comfort of your home.
about_author: Hello, I am Milagros (Mila) and I am a teacher of folkloric dances, graduated from the Jose Maria Arguedas National Superior School of Folklore. I have 10 years of experience and I have belonged to various folk groups with which I have danced throughout Peru and I have taught in different schools in Lima and state institutions. I am currently the director of Danzaria Peru, a dance studio focused on the dissemination of Peruvian folk dances through workshops for young people, adults, seniors, people with disabilities and anyone who wants to know, learn and enjoy different rhythms of the coast, mountains and jungle of Peru, as well as improving their physical and emotional health through art.We are accompanied by Ruth, a musician with 10 years of experience spreading the music of the Peruvian coast as a guitarist and percussionist.

title: Ukulele Lessons With Gold Record Musician
address: Kula, Hawaii, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: First we ªll learn how to tune the instrument, then we ªll learn some basic chords, proper fingering, and a basic strum. We ªll apply this to a simple song, and if  there ªs time left, we might move on to a second song. What makes my experience unique is the simple and efficient approach I bring to the learning process, as well as the cultural perspective. The student(s) will each need an ‚Äòukulele and a tuner. I recommend getting both on Amazon, and when the student signs up for the class, if they don ªt already have an ‚Äòukulele and tuner, I can give specific suggestions as to which reasonably priced items to get.Other things to noteYou do not need to be a musician or to have ever played a musical instrument before in order to take this class, but if you have some experience, it will help the speed of learning. If possible, I recommend viewing this experience on a computer or tablet.
about_author: I ªm an award winning musician with two gold records, several other awards, over 55 years of performing experience and over 40 years of teaching experience. I have five albums of music, three of them on Columbia Records and Sony Music. I was featured in the movies "Mad Dogs & Englishmen" and the  Oscar winning documentary "20 Feet From Stardom". For the last 20 years, I ªve been studying and specializing in Hawaiian music and culture, tutored by some of the finest Hawaiian musicians and "kumu hula". I ªve been teaching ‚Äòukulele for the last 12 years,  and I ªve developed a method to get absolute beginners playing a song within the first hour.  I enjoy working with beginners through intermediate students, and whatever the student learns from me can be applied to the music of their choice.
