title: Live the passion of tango and its poetry
address: Buenos Aires, Argentina¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in Spanish and English
act_int: Enjoy an exclusive concert that offers you to go through the different periods of tango without leaving your chair. You will immerse yourself in the passionate world of tango through music and poetry.Declared "Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity" by UNESCO, in 2009, tango is the essence of Buenos Aires' culture in Buenos Aires.With a 40 'live concert, we will explore together the human themes that run through it and its most emblematic composers. Poetry will be the icing on the cake.If you like singing, you will receive a song list with lyrics so you can sing the choruses with me.So you may sit down with a glass of wine and enjoy the tango song and its poetry.Other highlights:I will share the lyrics of the tangos and poetry at the beginning of the experience. At the end of the concert, we will talk about the themes that the musical genre addresses in each of its eras.
about_author: I love acting and singing. I am a professional actress and singer. I worked in theater, radio, and television for three decades. In the last one, I dedicated myself to giving shows and concerts in different rooms of concerts, theaters, and restaurants in Buenos Aires with local audiences and visitors from different countries. In 2020, I won the Performing Activities Contest in Virtual Environments organized by the National Theater Institute. Recently, The House of Argentina in Houston (USA) hired my show to celebrate the end of 2021 in streaming:https://fb.watch/aNa0ceiuvh/ Today I want to share the passion of telling and singing stories with you!

title: Now is the time to play a guitar song
address: Cabo San Lucas, Mexico¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: If you love music, have any type of guitar at home and you are thinking: I wish I could play a song!I can help you accomplish this goal.This is not a guitar lesson. This is a music experience and we are going to have some fun!During the Masterclass I will teach you tricks and tips to play a song.We will chat about your music passion and I will drive your fingers in a perfect and correct way.I have helped hundreds of people to make their dream come true.You don‚Äôt have any guitar? Ask a friend if you can borrow his.What are you waiting for? You can‚Äôt find a suitable time?Send me a message so I can find a day/time that works for you!It is very important that we have a zoom call by computer and not by phone. It will be a one to one experience, not a group one.
about_author: I live my life in music. Yes, I‚Äôm a guitar teacher, but not only. I started to teach long time ago when I was a young boy.I studied in a Private Music College in Milano (Italy) and after school I played more than 2500 concerts in clubs, festivals and hotels.Over the years I developed my personal music teaching method and have helped a lot of people to make their dreams become reality.I love to cook Thai recipes, fish and a variety of Italian recipes, of course. Soon I will share another Masterclass.

title: Piano Meditation Concert from Paris
address: Paris, France¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English, German, and French
act_int: One of Airbnb's 5 top-rated music and wellbeing Experiences *Request dates and times not listed*- Ideal for Corporate & Team-building, Milestone Celebrations, employee gratitude et Restorative Moments- 150 + enthusiastic companies: Accenture, Google, Microsoft, Axa, Disney, Pinterest, Facebook, Nike ‚Ä¶- Customisations 30' or 45' sessions + special themes  Immerse yourself in this heart-opening meditative journey across luxuriously beautiful soundscapes by Bach, Mozart or others. Reconnect with yourself or simply ‚Äòjust‚Äô enjoy!You‚Äôll be guided in a short mindfulness meditation helping you to tap into the deep resources of energy and peace that lie within each and everyone of us. Feel your breath while experiencing the music's own mesmerising and healing breathing rhythms, harmonies and melodies. Discover precious sound jewels hidden within vast and vibrant musical galaxies and be nourished by the music‚Äôs deeper meanings. I‚Äôll be performing live from my living room in Paris on my Steinway Concert Grand piano.  Experience calm, joy & ease Restore a sense of meaning and intention in your lifeExchange live with a world-class music and meditation expert - Groups from 10- 1000 participants
about_author: Bonjour, I am Beate, classical concert pianist, music expert, author and meditation teacher. Born in France, my music and piano studies took me from Germany to the USA, the UK and France while I also loved exploring music and philosophy at Harvard University. I received my PhD from the University of Cambridge (UK) where I taught for many years. My books are about Schumann, music, and poetry.I was introduced to Zen meditation when living in Kyoto in my early twenties and have practiced meditation ever since. This Concert Meditation has been enjoyed by more than 80 global organisations including Accenture, Amazon, Facebook, Microsoft, JP Morgan, EA Sport, Yara, Princeton University, Pinterest and more.Connect and introduce yourself on Instagram Beate.Perrey
